snippet: Belarus warned of an escalation of tensions after the European Union withdrew the ambassadors of all its member countries in response to human rights violations.
abstract: Belarus warns of an escalation of tensions after the European Union withdraws the ambassadors of all its member countries; at the center of the dispute is the human rights record of President Aleksandr G Lukashenko’s government; Western governments have been gradually increasing pressure on it in the hope that political and economic isolation will force political liberalization.
lead_paragraph: Belarus warned of an escalation of tensions after the European Union withdrew the ambassadors of all its member countries in response to human rights violations.

headline.seo: Belarus Sees ‘Dead End’ in European Pressure for Reform
headline.main: Belarus Warns European Union Over Withdrawal of Envoys
headline.print_headline: Belarus Sees ‘Dead End’ in European Pressure for Reform

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
